Some((Date(11,December,1920),[[Irish War of Independence]]: In retaliation for an [[Irish Republican Army|IRA]] ambush, British forces [[Burning of Cork|burn and loot numerous buildings in Cork city]]. Many civilians also reported being beaten, shot at, robbed and verbally abused by British forces.))
Some((Date(11,December,1925),[[Catholic Church|Roman Catholic]] [[Pope|papal]] [[encyclical]] ''[[Quas primas]]'' introduces the [[Feast of Christ the King]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1927),[[Guangzhou Uprising]]: [[Communist Party of China|Communist]] [[Red Guards (China)|Red Guards]] launch an uprising in [[Guangzhou]], China, taking over most of the city and announcing the formation of a Guangzhou [[Soviet (council)|Soviet]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1931),[[Statute of Westminster 1931]]: The [[Parliament of the United Kingdom|British Parliament]] establishes legislative equality between the UK and the [[Dominion]]s of the [[Commonwealth of Nations|Commonwealth]]&mdash;Australia, Canada, [[Dominion of Newfoundland|Newfoundland]], [[Dominion of New Zealand|New Zealand]], [[Union of South Africa|South Africa]], and [[Irish Free State|Ireland]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1934),[[Bill W.|Bill Wilson]], co-founder of [[Alcoholics Anonymous]], takes his last drink and enters treatment for the last time.))
Some((Date(11,December,1936),[[Edward VIII abdication crisis|Abdication Crisis]]: [[Edward VIII]]'s abdication as King of the United Kingdom and the [[Dominion|British Dominions beyond the Seas]], and [[Emperor of India]], becomes effective.))
Some((Date(11,December,1937),[[Second Italo-Ethiopian War]]: [[Kingdom of Italy|Italy]] leaves the [[League of Nations]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1941),[[World War II]]: [[Nazi Germany|Germany]] and Italy declare war on the United States, following the Americans' declaration of war on the [[Empire of Japan]] in the wake of the [[attack on Pearl Harbor]]. The United States, in turn, declares war on them.))
Some((Date(11,December,1946),The United Nations International Children's Emergency Fund ([[UNICEF]]) is established.))
Some((Date(11,December,1948),[[1948 Arab–Israeli War|Arab–Israeli War]]: The [[United Nations]] passes [[United Nations General Assembly Resolution 194|General Assembly Resolution 194]], creating a [[United Nations Conciliation Commission|Conciliation Commission]] to mediate the conflict.))
Some((Date(11,December,1958),[[French Upper Volta]] and [[French Dahomey]] gain self-government from [[French Fourth Republic|France]], becoming the [[Republic of Upper Volta]] and the [[Republic of Dahomey]] (now [[Benin]]), respectively, and joining the [[French Community]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1960),French forces crack down in a violent clash with protesters in [[French Algeria]] during a visit by [[President of France|French President]] [[Charles de Gaulle]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1962),[[Arthur Lucas]], convicted of murder, is the last person to be executed in Canada.))
Some((Date(11,December,1964),[[Che Guevara]] speaks at the [[United Nations General Assembly]] in New York City.))
Some((Date(11,December,1968),''[[The Rolling Stones Rock and Roll Circus]]'', featuring [[the Rolling Stones]], [[Jethro Tull (band)|Jethro Tull]], [[the Who]], [[Taj Mahal (musician)|Taj Mahal]], [[Marianne Faithfull]], and [[the Dirty Mac]] with [[Yoko Ono]], is filmed in [[Wembley]], London.))
Some((Date(11,December,1972),''[[Apollo 17]]'' becomes the sixth and last [[Apollo program|Apollo mission]] to land on the [[Moon]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1978),The [[Lufthansa heist]] is committed by a group led by [[Lucchese crime family|Lucchese family]] associate [[James Burke (gangster)|Jimmy Burke]].  It was the largest cash robbery ever committed on American soil, at that time.))
Some((Date(11,December,1980),The Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act ([[Superfund]]) is enacted by the [[United States Congress|U.S. Congress]].))
Some((Date(11,December,1981),[[El Mozote massacre]]: Armed forces in [[El Salvador]] kill an estimated 900 civilians in an anti-guerrilla campaign during the [[Salvadoran Civil War]].))

Some((Date(11,December,1997),The [[Kyoto Protocol]] opens for signature.))
Some((Date(11,December,1998),[[Thai Airways International Flight 261|Thai Airways Flight 261 crashes]] near [[Surat Thani Airport]], killing 101. The pilot flying the [[Airbus A310-300]] is thought to have suffered [[spatial disorientation]].))

This is followed by the [[Nanking Massacre]], in which Japanese troops rape and murder hundreds of thousands of civilians.))

Some((Date(15,December,1467),[[Stephen III of Moldavia]] defeats [[Matthias Corvinus]] of Hungary, with the latter being injured thrice, at the [[Battle of Baia]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1651),Castle Cornet in [[Guernsey]], the last stronghold which had supported the King in the [[Third English Civil War]], surrenders.))
Some((Date(15,December,1778),[[American Revolutionary War]]: [[Kingdom of Great Britain|British]] and French fleets clash in the [[Battle of St. Lucia]].))

Some((Date(15,December,1864),[[American Civil War]]: [[Battle of Nashville]]: [[Union (American Civil War)|Union]] forces under [[George Henry Thomas|George Thomas]] almost completely destroy the [[Army of Tennessee]] under [[John Bell Hood|John Hood]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1890),[[Hunkpapa]] [[Lakota people|Lakota]] leader [[Sitting Bull]] is killed on [[Standing Rock Indian Reservation]], leading to the [[Wounded Knee Massacre]]. ))

Some((Date(15,December,1933),The [[Twenty-first Amendment to the United States Constitution]] officially becomes effective, repealing the [[Eighteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution|Eighteenth Amendment]] that [[Prohibition in the United States|prohibited]] the sale, manufacture, and transportation of [[Alcoholic beverage|alcohol]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1939),''[[Gone with the Wind (film)|Gone with the Wind]]'' (highest inflation adjusted grossing film) receives its premiere at [[Loew's Grand Theatre]] in [[Atlanta|Atlanta, Georgia]], United States.))
Some((Date(15,December,1941),[[The Holocaust]]: [[Nazi Germany|German]] troops murder over 15,000 Jews at [[Drobytsky Yar]], a ravine southeast of the city of [[Kharkiv]], [[Ukraine]], [[Soviet Union]].))

Some((Date(15,December,1945),[[Occupation of Japan]]: General [[Douglas MacArthur]] orders that [[Shinto]] be abolished as the state religion of Japan.))
Some((Date(15,December,1946),U.S.-backed Iranian troops evict the leadership of the breakaway [[Republic of Mahabad]], putting an end to the [[Iran crisis of 1946]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1954),The [[Charter for the Kingdom of the Netherlands]] is signed.))
Some((Date(15,December,1960),[[Richard Paul Pavlick|Richard Pavlick]] is arrested for plotting to assassinate [[President-elect of the United States|U.S. President-Elect]] [[John F. Kennedy]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1961),[[Adolf Eichmann]] is sentenced to death after being found guilty by an [[Judicial system of Israel|Israeli court]] of 15 criminal charges, including charges of crimes against humanity, crimes against the Jewish people, and membership of an outlawed organization.))
Some((Date(15,December,1965),[[Project Gemini]]: ''[[Gemini 6A]]'', crewed by [[Wally Schirra]] and [[Thomas P. Stafford|Thomas Stafford]], is launched from [[Cape Canaveral|Cape Kennedy]], [[Florida]]. Four orbits later, it achieves the first [[space rendezvous]], with ''[[Gemini 7]]''.))
Some((Date(15,December,1967),The [[Silver Bridge]] over the [[Ohio River]] collapses, killing 46 people.))
Some((Date(15,December,1970),Soviet spacecraft ''[[Venera 7]]'' successfully lands on [[Venus]]. It is the first successful soft [[List of landings on extraterrestrial bodies|landing on another planet]]))
Some((Date(15,December,1973),[[John Paul Getty III]], grandson of American billionaire [[J. Paul Getty]], is found alive near [[Naples]], Italy, after being kidnapped by an Italian gang on July 10.))
Some((Date(15,December,1976),[[Western Samoa]] becomes a member of the [[United Nations]].))
Some((Date(15,December,1978),U.S. President [[Jimmy Carter]] announces that the United States will [[China–United States relations|recognize the People's Republic of China]] and [[Taiwan–United States relations|sever diplomatic relations with Taiwan]]))
Some((Date(15,December,1981),A [[1981 Iraqi embassy bombing|suicide car bombing targeting the Iraqi embassy]] in [[Beirut]], [[Lebanon]], levels the embassy and kills 61 people, including Iraq's ambassador to Lebanon. The attack is considered the first modern [[Suicide attack|suicide bombing]].))

Some((Date(15,December,1993),[[The Troubles]]: The [[Downing Street Declaration]] is issued by British [[Prime Minister of the United Kingdom|Prime Minister]] [[John Major]] and Irish [[Taoiseach]] [[Albert Reynolds]].))

Some((Date(26,December,1976),The [[Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist–Leninist)]] is founded.))
Some((Date(26,December,1982),''[[Time (magazine)|Time]]'s'' [[Time Person of the Year|Man of the Year]] is for the first time a non-human, the [[personal computer]].))
Some((Date(26,December,1991),The [[Supreme Soviet of the Soviet Union]] meets and formally dissolves the [[Soviet Union]].))
Some((Date(26,December,1994),Four [[Armed Islamic Group of Algeria|Armed Islamic Group]] [[Aircraft hijacking|hijackers]] seize control of [[Air France Flight 8969]]. When the plane lands at [[Marseille]], a [[National Gendarmerie|French Gendarmerie]] assault team boards the aircraft and kills the hijackers.))
Some((Date(26,December,1996),Six-year-old beauty queen [[Murder of JonBenét Ramsey|JonBenét Ramsey]] is found beaten and strangled in the basement of her family's home in [[Boulder, Colorado]].))
Some((Date(26,December,1997),The [[Soufrière Hills]] volcano on the island of [[Montserrat]] explodes, creating a small [[tsunami]] offshore.))
Some((Date(26,December,1998),[[Iraq]] announces its intention to fire upon U.S. and British warplanes that patrol the northern and southern [[Iraqi no-fly zones|no-fly zones]].))
Some((Date(26,December,1999),The storm [[Cyclone Lothar|Lothar]] sweeps across Central Europe, killing 137 and causing US$1.3 billion in damage.))
Some((Date(26,December,2003),A [[2003 Bam earthquake|magnitude 6.6 earthquake]] devastates southeast [[Iran]]ian city of [[Bam, Iran|Bam]], killing tens of thousands and destroying the citadel of [[Arg-é Bam]].))
Some((Date(26,December,2004),A [[2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami|9.3 magnitude earthquake]] creates a [[tsunami]] causing devastation in [[Sri Lanka]], [[India]], [[Indonesia]], [[Thailand]], [[Malaysia]], the [[Maldives]] and many other areas around the rim of the Indian Ocean, killing over 230,000.))
Some((Date(26,December,2006),An [[Pipeline transport#For oil or natural gas|oil pipeline]] in [[Lagos]], [[Nigeria]] [[2006 Abule Egba pipeline explosion|explodes]], killing at least 260.))
Some((Date(26,December,2009),China [[High-speed rail in China|opens]] the [[List of high-speed rail lines|world's longest]] high-speed [[Beijing–Guangzhou–Shenzhen–Hong Kong High-Speed Railway|rail route]], which links [[Beijing]] and [[Guangzhou]].

[[Martin Luther]] is being held in protective custody at the [[Wartburg Castle]] at this time. He is later released and is able, by his preaching, to regain the peace.))
Some((Date(27,December,1655),[[Second Northern War]]/the [[Deluge (history)|Deluge]]: Monks at the [[Jasna Góra Monastery]] in [[Częstochowa]] are successful in fending off a [[Siege of Jasna Góra|month-long siege]].))
Some((Date(27,December,1657),The [[Flushing Remonstrance]] is signed.))
Some((Date(27,December,1703),Portugal and England sign the [[Methuen Treaty]] which gives preference to Portuguese imported [[wine]]s into England.))
Some((Date(27,December,1814),[[War of 1812]]: The American schooner [[USS Carolina (1812)|USS ''Carolina'']] is destroyed. It was the last of Commodore [[Daniel Patterson]]'s makeshift fleet that fought a series of delaying actions that contributed to [[Andrew Jackson]]'s victory at the [[Battle of New Orleans]].))
Some((Date(27,December,1831),[[Charles Darwin]] embarks on [[Second voyage of HMS Beagle|his journey]] aboard the [[HMS Beagle|HMS ''Beagle'']], during which he will begin to formulate the theory of [[evolution]].))
Some((Date(27,December,1836),The worst ever [[Lewes avalanche|avalanche]] in England occurs at [[Lewes]], [[Sussex]], killing eight people.))
Some((Date(27,December,1845),[[Diethyl ether|Ether]] [[anesthetic]] is used for childbirth for the first time by Dr. [[Crawford Long]] in [[Jefferson, Georgia]].))

Some((Date(27,December,1968),[[Apollo program]]: ''[[Apollo 8]]'' splashes down in the Pacific Ocean, ending the first orbital manned mission to the Moon.))

Some((Date(28,December,1978),With the crew investigating a problem with the landing gear, [[United Airlines Flight 173]] runs out of fuel and crashes in [[Portland, Oregon]], killing ten. As a result, [[United Airlines]] instituted the industry's first [[crew resource management]] program.))

Some((Date(30,December,2013),More than 100 people are killed when anti-government forces [[December 2013 Kinshasa attacks|attack]] key buildings in [[Kinshasa]], [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]].

Some((Date(31,December,1225),The [[Lý dynasty]] of Vietnam ends after 216 years by the enthronement of the boy emperor [[Trần Thái Tông]], husband of the last Lý monarch, [[Lý Chiêu Hoàng]], starting the [[Trần dynasty]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1229),[[James I of Aragon]] the Conqueror enters Medina Mayurqa (now known as [[Palma, Majorca|Palma]], Spain) thus consummating the [[Christian]] reconquest of the island of [[Majorca]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1501),The [[First Battle of Cannanore]] commences.))
Some((Date(31,December,1600),The British [[East India Company]] is chartered.))
Some((Date(31,December,1660),[[James II of England]] is named [[Duke of Normandy]] by [[Louis XIV of France]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1687),The first [[Huguenot]]s set sail from France to the [[Cape of Good Hope]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1695),A [[window tax]] is imposed in England, causing many householders to brick up windows to avoid the tax.))
Some((Date(31,December,1757),Empress [[Elizabeth I of Russia]] issues her [[ukase]] incorporating [[Russian Prussia|Königsberg into Russia]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1759),Arthur Guinness signs a 9,000 year lease at [[Pound sterling|£]]45 per annum and starts brewing [[Guinness]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1775),[[American Revolutionary War]]: [[Battle of Quebec (1775)|Battle of Quebec]]: British forces repulse an attack by [[Continental Army]] General [[Richard Montgomery]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1790),''[[Efimeris]]'', the oldest Greek newspaper of which issues have survived till today, is published for the first time.))
Some((Date(31,December,1796),The incorporation of [[Baltimore]] as a city.))
Some((Date(31,December,1831),[[Gramercy Park]] is deeded to New York City.))
Some((Date(31,December,1853),A dinner party is held inside a life-size model of an [[iguanodon]] created by [[Benjamin Waterhouse Hawkins]] and Sir [[Richard Owen]] in south London, England.))
Some((Date(31,December,1857),[[Queen Victoria]] chooses [[Ottawa]], then a small [[logging]] town, as the capital of Canada.))
Some((Date(31,December,1862),[[American Civil War]]: [[Abraham Lincoln]] signs an act that admits [[West Virginia]] to the [[United States|Union]], thus dividing [[Virginia]] in two.))
Some((Date(31,December,1878),[[Karl Benz]], working in [[Mannheim]], Germany, filed for a [[patent]] on his first reliable [[Two-stroke engine|two-stroke gas engine]], and he was granted the patent in 1879.))
Some((Date(31,December,1879),[[Thomas Edison]] demonstrates [[Incandescent light bulb|incandescent lighting]] to the public for the first time, in [[Edison, New Jersey|Menlo Park, New Jersey]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1906),[[Mozaffar ad-Din Shah Qajar]] signs the [[Persian Constitution of 1906]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1907),The first [[New Year's Eve]] celebration is held in [[Times Square]] (then known as Longacre Square) in New York, New York.))
Some((Date(31,December,1909),[[Manhattan Bridge]] opens.))
Some((Date(31,December,1923),The chimes of [[Big Ben]] are broadcast on radio for the first time by the [[BBC]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1944),[[World War II]]: Hungary declares war on [[Nazi Germany]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1946),President [[Harry S. Truman]] officially proclaims the end of hostilities in World War II.))
Some((Date(31,December,1951),The [[Marshall Plan]] expires after distributing more than US$13.3 billion in foreign aid to rebuild Europe.))
Some((Date(31,December,1955),[[General Motors]] becomes the first U.S. corporation to make over US$1 billion in a year.))
Some((Date(31,December,1960),The [[Farthing (British coin)|farthing coin]] ceases to be [[legal tender]] in the United Kingdom.))
Some((Date(31,December,1961),[[Raidió Teilifís Éireann|RTÉ]], Ireland's state broadcaster, launches its first national television service.))
Some((Date(31,December,1963),[[Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland|The Central African Federation]] officially collapses, subsequently becoming [[Zambia]], [[Malawi]] and [[Rhodesia]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1965),[[Jean-Bédel Bokassa]], leader of the [[Central African Republic]] army, and his military officers [[Saint-Sylvestre coup d'état|begins a coup d'état]] against the government of [[List of heads of state of the Central African Republic and Central African Empire|President]] [[David Dacko]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1967),The [[Youth International Party]], popularly known as the "Yippies", is founded.))
Some((Date(31,December,1981),A [[coup d'état]] in [[Ghana]] removes [[List of heads of state of Ghana|President]] [[Hilla Limann]]'s [[People's National Party (Ghana)|PNP]] [[Limann government|government]] and replaces it with the [[Provisional National Defence Council]] led by [[Flight lieutenant]] [[Jerry Rawlings]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1983),The [[AT&T Corporation|AT&T]] [[Bell System]] is broken up by the United States Government.))
Some((Date(31,December,1986),A [[Dupont Plaza Hotel arson|fire at the Dupont Plaza Hotel]] in [[San Juan, Puerto Rico]], kills 97 and injures 140.))
Some((Date(31,December,1988),[[Pittsburgh Penguins]]' [[Mario Lemieux]] becomes the only [[National Hockey League]] player to score [[Goal (ice hockey)|goals]] in five different ways: even strength, shorthanded, power play, penalty shot, and empty net, during an 8–6 win over the [[New Jersey Devils]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1991),All official [[Soviet Union]] institutions have ceased operations by this date and the Soviet Union is [[Dissolution of the Soviet Union|officially dissolved]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1992),[[Czechoslovakia]] is [[Dissolution of Czechoslovakia|peacefully dissolved]] in what is dubbed by media as the ''Velvet Divorce'', resulting in the creation of the [[Czech Republic]] and [[Slovakia]].))
Some((Date(31,December,1994),This date is skipped altogether in [[Kiribati]] as the [[Phoenix Islands]] and [[Line Islands]] change time zones from [[UTC−11:00]] to [[UTC+13:00]] and [[UTC−10:00]] to [[UTC+14:00]], respectively.))
Some((Date(31,December,1998),The [[European Exchange Rate Mechanism]] freezes the values of the legacy currencies in the [[Eurozone]], and establishes the value of the [[euro]] currency.))
Some((Date(31,December,1999),First [[President of Russia]], [[Boris Yeltsin]], resigns from office, leaving [[Prime Minister of Russia|Prime Minister]] [[Vladimir Putin]] as the acting President and successor.))
Some((Date(31,December,2004),The official opening of [[Taipei 101]], the [[List of tallest buildings and structures in the world|tallest]] [[skyscraper]] at that time in the world, standing at a height of {{convert|509|m|ft}}.))
Some((Date(31,December,2009),Both a [[blue moon]] and a [[December 2009 lunar eclipse|lunar eclipse]] occur.))
Some((Date(31,December,2010),[[2010 New Year's Eve tornado outbreak|Tornadoes]] touch down in [[Midwestern United States|midwestern]] and [[southern United States]], including [[Washington County, Arkansas]]; [[Greater St. Louis]], [[Sunset Hills, Missouri]], [[Illinois]], and [[Oklahoma]], with a few tornadoes in the early hours. A total 36 tornadoes touched down, resulting in the deaths of nine people and $113 million in damages.))
Some((Date(31,December,2011),[[NASA]] succeeds in putting the first of two [[Gravity Recovery and Interior Laboratory]] [[satellite]]s in orbit around the Moon.))
Some((Date(31,December,2014),A New Year's Eve celebration [[2014 Shanghai stampede|stampede]] in [[Shanghai]] kills at least 36 people and injures 49 others.

))
